# ColumnSelection.exclude(columnNames:)

**Case**

Selects all columns except the specified columns.

## Declaration

```swift
case exclude(columnNames: [String])
```

## Column selection types

- **ColumnSelection.all**: Select all columns in the data frame.
- **ColumnSelection.include(columnNames:)**: Selects only the specified columns.
- **ColumnSelection.numeric**: Select all numeric columns in the data frame.
